articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz regains No. 1 ranking over Novak Djokovic with first grass court championship - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Alcaraz regains his No. 1 ranking just one week before Wimbledon.
articles.content:
Carlos Alcaraz is proving that his prodigious talent translates to any surface.
Alcaraz won the Queen's Club Championships on Sunday, defeating Aussie Alex de Minaur 6-4, 6-4 to win his first grass-… [+1644 chars]
